document.full_text: officials in the town of alameda, california, are revising rescue procedures after the suicide of a man who waded into the frigid waters of san francisco bay and succumbed to hypothermia as firefighters and police watched from shore.
document.title: man kills himself in san francisco bay as police watch
lines_and_colors: officials in the town of alameda, california, are revising rescue procedures after the suicide of a man who waded into the frigid waters of san francisco bay and succumbed to hypothermia as firefighters and police watched from shore.
